item.title: The Mandalorians - Guide to Potty Training a Baby Yoda
item.description: The Mandalorian’s ‘Guide to Potty Training a Baby Yoda: It’s Not Rocket Science, It’s Just the Force’ So you’ve found yourself the proud guardian of a cute but occasionally mischievous little green bundle of joy? Fear not, fellow spacefarer, for even the most seasoned Mandalorian can face the challenge of potty training a Baby Yoda. Here are some tried and tested tips from the galaxy’s best bounty hunters: 1. Use the Force, But Not Too Much Yes, Baby Yoda may have some Force sensitivity, but that doesn’t mean you should rely on it entirely for potty training.
